General.Name: CJ Cheiljedang
General.Description: CJ Cheiljedang Corporation engages food and bio businesses. It offers processed meat and frozen food, fresh food, seasoning, sweeteners, flour, edible oil, and starch, as well as seaweed, dessert, snack, and health-functional food; and amino acids and feed. CJ Cheiljedang Corporation was founded in 1953 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
